content:
Oh the structure of the table of contents is so great. Then, may I ask you to write the first chapter, the one below?
Introduction
a. Briefly introduce the concept of WordPress object types
b. Explain the importance of understanding object types for novice WordPress developers
c. Mention the four main object types: post, user, taxonomy, and comment
d. Refer to Felix Arntz's blog posts or slides as a valuable resource
Answer in English.지금 번역하기
